Question: Can you show me the players who scored more than 2 goals in one game? I’d like to see their player_id, name, match number, and how many goals they scored.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT player_id, player_name, match_no, COUNT(*) AS goals_scored
FROM player_mast
INNER JOIN goal_details ON player_mast.player_id = goal_details.player_id
GROUP BY player_id, player_name, match_no
HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no, COUNT(*) AS total_goals
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

Question: Tolong tampilkan pemain yang mencetak lebih dari 2 gol dalam satu pertandingan. Saya mau lihat player_id, nama pemain, match_no, dan total golnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no, COUNT(gd.goal_id) AS total_goals
FROM goal_details AS gd
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
GROUP BY gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
HAVING COUNT(gd.goal_id) > 2;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no, COUNT(*) AS total_goals
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

Question: Show all matches where the final score was a draw. Display the match number.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT match_no FROM match_mast WHERE results = 'Draw';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT 
    md1.match_no
FROM 
    match_details md1
JOIN 
    match_details md2
    ON md1.match_no = md2.match_no
    AND md1.team_id <> md2.team_id
WHERE 
    md1.goal_score = md2.goal_score
GROUP BY 
    md1.match_no, md1.goal_score
ORDER BY 
    md1.match_no;

Question: Tampilkan semua pertandingan yang berakhir imbang. Sertakan nomor pertandingan.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT match_no FROM match_mast WHERE results = 'DRAW';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT 
    md1.match_no
FROM 
    match_details md1
JOIN 
    match_details md2
    ON md1.match_no = md2.match_no
    AND md1.team_id <> md2.team_id
WHERE 
    md1.goal_score = md2.goal_score
GROUP BY 
    md1.match_no, md1.goal_score
ORDER BY 
    md1.match_no;

Question: Which teams managed to win all their group stage matches? I need to see team_id and how many matches they won.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, won FROM soccer_team WHERE won = match_played AND match_played > 0
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS total_wins
  FROM match_details
  WHERE play_stage = 'G' AND win_lose = 'W'
  GROUP BY team_id
  HAVING COUNT(*) = (
  SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match_details md2
  WHERE md2.team_id = match_details.team_id AND play_stage = 'G'
  );

Question: Tim mana saja yang menang terus di babak grup? Tampilkan team_id dan total menangnya.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, won FROM soccer_team WHERE lost = 0
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS total_wins
  FROM match_details
  WHERE play_stage = 'G' AND win_lose = 'W'
  GROUP BY team_id
  HAVING COUNT(*) = (
  SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match_details md2
  WHERE md2.team_id = match_details.team_id AND play_stage = 'G'
  );

Question: Can you list referees who led more than 3 matches? I want their referee_id, name, and total matches they officiated.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT referee_id, referee_name, COUNT(match_no) AS total_matches
FROM referee_mast rm
JOIN match_mast mm ON rm.referee_id = mm.referee_id
GROUP BY referee_id, referee_name
HAVING COUNT(match_no) > 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

Question: Saya ingin tahu wasit yang memimpin lebih dari 3 pertandingan. Tampilkan referee_id, nama wasit, dan jumlah pertandingan.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT referee_id, referee_name, COUNT(match_no) AS match_count
FROM referee_mast rm
JOIN match_mast mm ON rm.referee_id = mm.referee_id
GROUP BY referee_id, referee_name
HAVING COUNT(match_no) > 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

Question: Show me which players were both substituted in and out in the same game. Include player_id, name, and match number.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
FROM player_in_out AS pio
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE pio.in_out = 'I'
INTERSECT
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
FROM player_in_out AS pio
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE pio.in_out = 'O';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pio.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
  FROM player_in_out pio
  JOIN player_mast pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
  WHERE EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM player_in_out p2
  WHERE p2.player_id = pio.player_id AND p2.match_no = pio.match_no
  AND p2.in_out != pio.in_out
  );

Question: Tampilkan pemain yang pernah diganti masuk dan juga diganti keluar di satu pertandingan yang sama. Sertakan player_id, nama, dan nomor pertandingannya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
FROM player_in_out AS pio
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE pio.in_out = 'I'
INTERSECT
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
FROM player_in_out AS pio
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE pio.in_out = 'O';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pio.player_id, pm.player_name, pio.match_no
  FROM player_in_out pio
  JOIN player_mast pm ON pio.player_id = pm.player_id
  WHERE EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM player_in_out p2
  WHERE p2.player_id = pio.player_id AND p2.match_no = pio.match_no
  AND p2.in_out != pio.in_out
  );

Question: Which players got a card and also scored a goal in the same match? I’d like to see player_id, player name, and match number.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pb.player_id, pm.player_name, pb.match_no
FROM player_booked AS pb
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pb.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM goal_details AS gd
    WHERE gd.player_id = pb.player_id AND gd.match_no = pb.match_no
);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pb.player_id, pm.player_name, pb.match_no
  FROM player_booked pb
  JOIN goal_details gd ON pb.player_id = gd.player_id AND pb.match_no = gd.match_no
  JOIN player_mast pm ON pb.player_id = pm.player_id;

Question: Siapa saja pemain yang dapat kartu dan cetak gol di pertandingan yang sama? Tampilkan player_id, nama pemain, dan nomor pertandingannya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pb.player_id, pm.player_name, pb.match_no
FROM player_booked AS pb
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON pb.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE pb.match_no IN (SELECT match_no FROM goal_details WHERE player_id = pb.player_id);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pb.player_id, pm.player_name, pb.match_no
  FROM player_booked pb
  JOIN goal_details gd ON pb.player_id = gd.player_id AND pb.match_no = gd.match_no
  JOIN player_mast pm ON pb.player_id = pm.player_id;

Question: Can you list teams that scored more goals than they conceded in the tournament? I want team_id, goal_for, goal_agnst, and goal_diff.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, goal_for, goal_agnst, goal_diff
FROM soccer_team
WHERE goal_for > goal_agnst

Question: Tampilkan tim-tim yang jumlah gol masuknya lebih banyak dari gol kebobolannya. Saya butuh team_id, goal_for, goal_agnst, dan goal_diff.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, goal_for, goal_agnst, goal_diff FROM soccer_team WHERE goal_for > goal_agnst

Question: Show me the venues where audience attendance reached the highest. I want venue_name, the city, and the max audience number. Sort from highest.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_name, sc.city, mm.audence AS max_audience
FROM match_mast AS mm
JOIN soccer_venue AS sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
JOIN soccer_city AS sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
WHERE mm.audence = (SELECT MAX(audence) FROM match_mast)
ORDER BY max_audience DESC;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_name, sc.city, MAX(mm.audence) AS max_audience
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY sv.venue_name, sc.city
  ORDER BY max_audience DESC;

Question: Venue mana saja yang penontonnya banyak? Saya mau lihat nama venue, kota, dan jumlah penonton terbanyaknya. Urutkan dari yang terbanyak.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_name, sc.city, sv.aud_capacity
FROM soccer_venue AS sv
JOIN soccer_city AS sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
ORDER BY sv.aud_capacity DESC;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_name, sc.city, MAX(mm.audence) AS max_audience
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY sv.venue_name, sc.city
  ORDER BY max_audience DESC;

Question: Find the players who were never substituted out in any match. Please show player_id and their name.
Tampilkan pemain yang tidak pernah diganti keluar selama pertandingan. Sertakan player_id dan nama pemainnya.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_mast EXCEPT SELECT p.player_id, p.player_name FROM player_mast p JOIN player_in_out pio ON p.player_id = pio.player_id WHERE pio.in_out = 'O'

Question: Which matches had 3 or more players from the same team getting booked? Show match number, team_id, and how many players were booked.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT match_no, team_id, COUNT(*) AS booked_players FROM player_booked GROUP BY match_no, team_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS booked_count
  FROM player_booked
  GROUP BY match_no, team_id
  HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 2;

Question: Pertandingan mana yang punya 3 atau lebih pemain dari satu tim yang kena kartu? Tampilkan match_no, team_id, dan jumlah pemain yang kena kartu.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS booked_players
FROM player_booked
GROUP BY match_no, team_id
HAVING COUNT(player_id) >= 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS booked_count
  FROM player_booked
  GROUP BY match_no, team_id
  HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 2;

Question: Can you show players who scored in both the first and second halves of a game? I want player_id, name, and match number.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT p.player_id, p.player_name, g1.match_no
FROM player_mast AS p
JOIN goal_details AS g1 ON p.player_id = g1.player_id
JOIN goal_details AS g2 ON p.player_id = g2.player_id AND g1.match_no = g2.match_no
WHERE g1.goal_half = 1 AND g2.goal_half = 2;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  WHERE goal_half = 1
  AND EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM goal_details gd2
  WHERE gd2.player_id = gd.player_id AND gd2.match_no = gd.match_no AND gd2.goal_half = 2
  );

Question: Tampilkan pemain yang cetak gol di babak pertama dan kedua di satu pertandingan. Saya mau lihat player_id, nama, dan match_no-nya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
FROM goal_details AS gd
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_half = 1
INTERSECT
SELECT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
FROM goal_details AS gd
JOIN player_mast AS pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_half = 2;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT gd.player_id, pm.player_name, gd.match_no
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  WHERE goal_half = 1
  AND EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM goal_details gd2
  WHERE gd2.player_id = gd.player_id AND gd2.match_no = gd.match_no AND gd2.goal_half = 2
  );

Question: Which players were both involved in goals and received bookings? Show their player_id, name, and how many goals and bookings.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT p.player_id, p.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT g.goal_id) AS goals, COUNT(DISTINCT b.match_no) AS bookings
FROM player_mast AS p
JOIN goal_details AS g ON p.player_id = g.player_id
JOIN player_booked AS b ON p.player_id = b.player_id
GROUP BY p.player_id, p.player_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT g.goal_id) > 0 AND COUNT(DISTINCT b.match_no) > 0;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT
  p.player_id,
  p.player_name,
  COUNT(g.goal_id) AS goal_count,
  COUNT(b.match_no) AS booking_count
FROM player_mast AS p
LEFT JOIN goal_details AS g ON p.player_id = g.player_id
LEFT JOIN player_booked AS b ON p.player_id = b.player_id
GROUP BY p.player_id, p.player_name
HAVING COUNT(g.goal_id) > 0 AND COUNT(b.match_no) > 0;

Question: Siapa saja pemain yang pernah cetak gol dan juga kena kartu? Tampilkan player_id, nama, total gol dan jumlah kartu.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) AS total_goals, COUNT(DISTINCT pb.match_no) AS total_bookings
FROM player_mast AS pm
JOIN goal_details AS gd ON pm.player_id = gd.player_id
JOIN player_booked AS pb ON pm.player_id = pb.player_id
GROUP BY pm.player_id, pm.player_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) > 0 AND COUNT(DISTINCT pb.match_no) > 0;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT
  p.player_id,
  p.player_name,
  COUNT(g.goal_id) AS goal_count,
  COUNT(b.match_no) AS booking_count
FROM player_mast AS p
LEFT JOIN goal_details AS g ON p.player_id = g.player_id
LEFT JOIN player_booked AS b ON p.player_id = b.player_id
GROUP BY p.player_id, p.player_name
HAVING COUNT(g.goal_id) > 0 AND COUNT(b.match_no) > 0;

Question: Which venues hosted more than 3 different matches? Please show venue_id, venue name, and match count.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, COUNT(match_no) AS match_count
FROM soccer_venue sv JOIN match_mast mm ON sv.venue_id = mm.venue_id
GROUP BY venue_id, venue_name
HAVING COUNT(match_no) > 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_id, sv.venue_name, COUNT(*) AS match_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  GROUP BY sv.venue_id, sv.venue_name
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

Question: Venue mana yang jadi tempat 3 pertandingan atau lebih? Tampilkan venue_id, nama venue, dan jumlah pertandingan.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, COUNT(*) AS match_count
FROM soccer_venue AS v
JOIN match_mast AS m ON v.venue_id = m.venue_id
GROUP BY venue_id, venue_name
HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sv.venue_id, sv.venue_name, COUNT(*) AS match_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  GROUP BY sv.venue_id, sv.venue_name
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

Question: List cities that had matches with more than 50,000 audience members. Show city, match_no, and audience.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, mm.match_no, mm.audence
FROM soccer_city AS sc
JOIN soccer_venue AS sv ON sc.city_id = sv.city_id
JOIN match_mast AS mm ON sv.venue_id = mm.venue_id
WHERE mm.audence > 50000;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, mm.match_no, mm.audence
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  WHERE mm.audence > 50000;

Question: Kota mana yang punya pertandingan dengan penonton lebih dari 50 ribu? Saya butuh nama kota, nomor pertandingan, dan jumlah penonton.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, mm.match_no, mm.audence
FROM soccer_city AS sc
JOIN soccer_venue AS sv ON sc.city_id = sv.city_id
JOIN match_mast AS mm ON sv.venue_id = mm.venue_id
WHERE mm.audence > 50000;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, mm.match_no, mm.audence
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  WHERE mm.audence > 50000;

Question: Which teams had more than 2 different coaches? Show team_id and how many coaches they had.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, COUNT(coach_id) AS num_coaches FROM team_coaches GROUP BY team_id HAVING COUNT(coach_id) > 2
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, COUNT(DISTINCT coach_id) AS coach_count
  FROM team_coaches
  GROUP BY team_id
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT coach_id) > 2;

Question: Tim mana yang pelatihnya ganti-ganti sampai lebih dari 2 kali? Tampilkan team_id dan jumlah pelatihnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, COUNT(coach_id) AS jumlah_pelatih
FROM team_coaches
GROUP BY team_id
HAVING COUNT(coach_id) > 2;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, COUNT(DISTINCT coach_id) AS coach_count
  FROM team_coaches
  GROUP BY team_id
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT coach_id) > 2;

Question: Which referees handled matches with average audience over 40,000? I want referee_id, name, and average audience.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT referee_id, referee_name, audence FROM referee_mast AS rm JOIN match_mast AS mm ON rm.referee_id = mm.referee_id WHERE mm.audence > 40000 GROUP BY referee_id, referee_name, audence HAVING AVG(audence) > 40000
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name, AVG(mm.audence) AS avg_audience
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name
  HAVING AVG(mm.audence) > 40000;

Question: Wasit mana yang rata-rata penonton di pertandingannya lebih dari 40 ribu? Tampilkan referee_id, nama wasit, dan rata-rata penonton.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT mm.referee_id, rm.referee_name, AVG(mm.audence) AS avg_audience
FROM match_mast AS mm
JOIN referee_mast AS rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
GROUP BY mm.referee_id, rm.referee_name
HAVING AVG(mm.audence) > 40000;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name, AVG(mm.audence) AS avg_audience
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id, rm.referee_name
  HAVING AVG(mm.audence) > 40000;

Question: Which captains also managed to score unique goals? I want to see their player_id, name, number of goals, and how many matches they were captain.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) AS num_goals, COUNT(DISTINCT mc.match_no) AS num_matches_captain
FROM player_mast AS pm
JOIN match_captain AS mc ON pm.player_id = mc.player_captain
JOIN goal_details AS gd ON pm.player_id = gd.player_id
GROUP BY pm.player_id, pm.player_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) > 0;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT mc.player_captain AS player_id, pm.player_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) AS total_goals,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mc.match_no) AS total_captain_matches
  FROM match_captain mc
  JOIN goal_details gd ON mc.player_captain = gd.player_id
  JOIN player_mast pm ON mc.player_captain = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY mc.player_captain, pm.player_name;

Question: Siapa aja pemain yang jadi kapten sekaligus mencetak goal? Tampilkan player_id, nama, jumlah gol yang unik, dan berapa kali dia jadi kapten di pertandingan yang unik.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT pm.player_id, pm.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) AS total_goals, COUNT(DISTINCT mc.match_no) AS total_captain FROM player_mast AS pm JOIN goal_details AS gd ON pm.player_id = gd.player_id JOIN match_captain AS mc ON pm.player_id = mc.player_captain GROUP BY pm.player_id, pm.player_name
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT mc.player_captain AS player_id, pm.player_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT gd.goal_id) AS total_goals,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mc.match_no) AS total_captain_matches
  FROM match_captain mc
  JOIN goal_details gd ON mc.player_captain = gd.player_id
  JOIN player_mast pm ON mc.player_captain = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY mc.player_captain, pm.player_name;

Question: List all teams where there is a player that has been both booked and scored in the same match. Show team_id and match_no.
Pertandingan mana aja yang ada pemain dari satu tim yang cetak gol dan juga kena kartu? Saya mau lihat team_id dan match_no.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, match_no FROM player_booked INTERSECT SELECT team_id, match_no FROM goal_details

Question: What is the total number of substitutions (counting both in and out) per match, divided by 2? Show match_no and average_subs.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT match_no, COUNT(player_id) / 2.0 AS average_subs FROM player_in_out GROUP BY match_no

Question: Hitung total pergantian pemain (masuk dan keluar) per pertandingan, lalu bagi dua. Tampilkan match_no dan rata-rata pergantian pemain.
Which cities had matches where the player of the match also scored? Show me unique city name and match number.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT SC.city, MM.match_no
FROM match_mast AS MM
JOIN soccer_venue AS SV ON MM.venue_id = SV.venue_id
JOIN soccer_city AS SC ON SV.city_id = SC.city_id
WHERE MM.plr_of_match IN (SELECT player_id FROM goal_details WHERE match_no = MM.match_no);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT sc.city, mm.match_no
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  JOIN goal_details gd ON gd.match_no = mm.match_no AND gd.player_id = mm.plr_of_match;

Question: Kota mana aja yang punya pertandingan di mana player of the match-nya juga cetak gol? Tampilkan nama kota dan match_no-nya secara unik.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT city, mm.match_no
FROM match_mast AS mm
JOIN soccer_venue AS sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
JOIN soccer_city AS sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
WHERE mm.plr_of_match IN (SELECT player_id FROM goal_details WHERE match_no = mm.match_no);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT sc.city, mm.match_no
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  JOIN goal_details gd ON gd.match_no = mm.match_no AND gd.player_id = mm.plr_of_match;

Question: Which matches had all goals scored in the first half only? Show match number and number of goals.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS num_goals
FROM goal_details
WHERE goal_half = 1
GROUP BY match_no
HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goal_details gd2 WHERE gd2.match_no = goal_details.match_no);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS goal_count
  FROM goal_details
  GROUP BY match_no
  HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN goal_half = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0;

Question: Pertandingan mana yang semua golnya tercipta di babak pertama? Saya mau lihat match_no dan jumlah golnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS num_goals
FROM goal_details
WHERE goal_half = 1
GROUP BY match_no
HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goal_details gd2 WHERE gd2.match_no = goal_details.match_no);
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS goal_count
  FROM goal_details
  GROUP BY match_no
  HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN goal_half = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0;

Question: Which teams have high goal difference divided by match played? I need team_id and the average value. Sort by value descending
Generated SQL Query: SELECT team_id, goal_diff::FLOAT / match_played::FLOAT AS avg_goal_diff_per_match FROM soccer_team WHERE match_played > 0 ORDER BY avg_goal_diff_per_match DESC
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, goal_diff / match_played AS avg_goal_diff
  FROM soccer_team
  WHERE match_played > 0
  ORDER BY avg_goal_diff DESC;

Question: Tim mana yang punya selisih gol dibagi dengan jumlah match yang dimainkan tinggi? Tampilkan team_id dan rata-ratanya. Urutkan dari yang tertinggi
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT team_id, goal_diff / match_played AS avg_goal_diff
  FROM soccer_team
  WHERE match_played > 0
  ORDER BY avg_goal_diff DESC;

Question: Which matches had more than 5 total substitutions? Show match number and how many subs.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS num_subs FROM player_in_out GROUP BY match_no HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS total_subs
  FROM player_in_out
  GROUP BY match_no
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

Question: Pertandingan mana aja yang pergantian pemainnya lebih dari 5 kali? Tampilkan match_no dan jumlahnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS jumlah_pergantian
FROM player_in_out
GROUP BY match_no
HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(*) AS total_subs
  FROM player_in_out
  GROUP BY match_no
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

Question: Which matches had at least one goal scored during stoppage time (ST)? Please give match number and goal_id.

Question: Pertandingan mana yang ada gol di waktu stoppage (ST)? Tampilkan match_no dan goal_id-nya.

  FROM player_booked
  GROUP BY match_no

Question: Pertandingan mana aja yang kedua timnya punya pemain yang kena kartu? Tampilkan match_no dan jumlah tim yang kena kartu.

Question: Which coaches were assigned to more than one team? Show coach_id and how many teams.

  FROM team_coaches

  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT team_id) > 1;

Question: Pelatih mana yang pernah melatih lebih dari satu tim? Saya mau lihat coach_id dan jumlah timnya.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT coach_id, COUNT(DISTINCT team_id) AS jumlah_tim FROM team_coaches GROUP BY coach_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT team_id) > 1

  FROM team_coaches

Question: List cities whose venues together can seat more than 100,000 people. Show city and total capacity.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT city, SUM(aud_capacity) AS total_capacity
FROM soccer_venue AS v
JOIN soccer_city AS c ON v.city_id = c.city_id
GROUP BY city
HAVING SUM(aud_capacity) > 100000;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, SUM(sv.aud_capacity) AS total_capacity
  FROM soccer_venue sv
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY sc.city
  HAVING SUM(sv.aud_capacity) > 100000;

Question: Kota mana yang total kapasitas stadionnya lebih dari 100 ribu? Tampilkan nama kota dan total kapasitasnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT city, SUM(aud_capacity) AS total_capacity
FROM soccer_venue AS v
JOIN soccer_city AS c ON v.city_id = c.city_id
GROUP BY city
HAVING SUM(aud_capacity) > 100000;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT sc.city, SUM(sv.aud_capacity) AS total_capacity
  FROM soccer_venue sv
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY sc.city
  HAVING SUM(sv.aud_capacity) > 100000;

Question: Find matches where a player took part in a penalty shootout (dont consider success or not) and also scored a non-penalty goal. Show match_no and player_id.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT ps.match_no, ps.player_id
FROM penalty_shootout AS ps
INNER JOIN goal_details AS gd ON ps.match_no = gd.match_no AND ps.player_id = gd.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_type <> 'P';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT ps.match_no, ps.player_id
FROM penalty_shootout ps
JOIN goal_details gd ON ps.match_no = gd.match_no AND ps.player_id = gd.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_type IS DISTINCT FROM 'P';

Question: Cari pertandingan di mana seorang pemain ikut dalam adu penalti (tidak peduli masuk atau tidak) dan juga mencetak gol (bukan dari penalti). Tampilkan match_no dan player_id.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT ps.match_no, ps.player_id
FROM penalty_shootout AS ps
JOIN goal_details AS gd ON ps.match_no = gd.match_no AND ps.player_id = gd.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_type <> 'P';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT ps.match_no, ps.player_id
FROM penalty_shootout ps
JOIN goal_details gd ON ps.match_no = gd.match_no AND ps.player_id = gd.player_id
WHERE gd.goal_type IS DISTINCT FROM 'P';

Question: Which teams let in more goals than they scored? I need team_id, goal_for, and goal_agnst.
Tim mana yang kebobolannya lebih banyak daripada gol yang mereka cetak? Tampilkan team_id, goal_for, dan goal_agnst.
Find players who changed teams but kept the same jersey number. Show player_id and jersey_no.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT player_id, jersey_no
FROM player_mast
GROUP BY player_id, jersey_no
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT team_id) > 1;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT player_id, jersey_no
  FROM player_mast
  GROUP BY player_id, jersey_no
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) > 1;

Question: Pemain mana saja yang ganti tim tapi tetap pakai nomor jersey yang sama? Saya mau lihat player_id dan nomor kausnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT p1.player_id, p1.jersey_no
FROM player_mast AS p1
JOIN player_mast AS p2 ON p1.player_id <> p2.player_id AND p1.jersey_no = p2.jersey_no
WHERE p1.team_id <> p2.team_id;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT player_id, jersey_no
  FROM player_mast
  GROUP BY player_id, jersey_no
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) > 1;

Question: List referees who have officiated matches in more than one city. Show referee_id and how many cities.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sv.city_id) AS num_cities
FROM match_mast mm
JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
GROUP BY referee_id
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sv.city_id) > 1
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sc.city) AS city_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sc.city) > 1;

Question: Wasit mana yang pernah memimpin pertandingan di lebih dari satu kota? Tampilkan referee_id dan jumlah kotanya.
Generated SQL Query: SELECT referee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT T2.city_id) FROM match_mast AS T1 JOIN soccer_venue AS T2 ON T1.venue_id  =  T2.venue_id GROUP BY referee_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.city_id)  >  1
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT rm.referee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sc.city) AS city_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN referee_mast rm ON mm.referee_id = rm.referee_id
  JOIN soccer_venue sv ON mm.venue_id = sv.venue_id
  JOIN soccer_city sc ON sv.city_id = sc.city_id
  GROUP BY rm.referee_id
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sc.city) > 1;

Question: Which matches had players from more than 3 different clubs scoring goals? Show match number and number of clubs.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) AS num_clubs
FROM goal_details gd
JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
GROUP BY match_no
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) > 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT gd.match_no, COUNT(DISTINCT pm.playing_club) AS club_count
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY gd.match_no
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pm.playing_club) > 3;

Question: Pertandingan mana saja yang memiliki pemain dari lebih dari 3 klub berbeda yang mencetak gol? Tampilkan match_no dan jumlah klubnya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT match_no, COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) AS num_clubs
FROM goal_details gd
JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
GROUP BY match_no
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT playing_club) > 3;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT gd.match_no, COUNT(DISTINCT pm.playing_club) AS club_count
  FROM goal_details gd
  JOIN player_mast pm ON gd.player_id = pm.player_id
  GROUP BY gd.match_no
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pm.playing_club) > 3;

Question: List players who were captains and also got a red card. Show their player_id and match number.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT mc.player_captain, pb.match_no
FROM match_captain AS mc
JOIN player_booked AS pb ON mc.player_captain = pb.player_id AND mc.match_no = pb.match_no
WHERE pb.sent_off = 'Y';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pb.player_id, pb.match_no
  FROM player_booked pb
  JOIN match_captain mc ON pb.player_id = mc.player_captain AND pb.match_no = mc.match_no
  WHERE pb.sent_off = 'Y';

Question: Pemain mana yang jadi kapten dan juga kena kartu merah? Saya butuh player_id dan match_no-nya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT mc.player_captain, pb.match_no
FROM match_captain AS mc
JOIN player_booked AS pb ON mc.player_captain = pb.player_id AND mc.match_no = pb.match_no
WHERE pb.sent_off = 'Y';
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT DISTINCT pb.player_id, pb.match_no
  FROM player_booked pb
  JOIN match_captain mc ON pb.player_id = mc.player_captain AND pb.match_no = mc.match_no
  WHERE pb.sent_off = 'Y';

Question: Which coaches worked with teams that never won a single match? Show coach_id and team_id.

  JOIN soccer_team st ON tc.team_id = st.team_id
  WHERE st.won = 0;

Question: Which venues hosted the most matches that ended in penalty shootouts? Show venue_id and number of matches.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT venue_id, COUNT(*) AS num_matches
FROM match_mast
WHERE decided_by = 'P'
GROUP BY venue_id
ORDER BY num_matches DESC;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT mm.venue_id, COUNT(DISTINCT mm.match_no) AS penalty_match_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN match_details md ON mm.match_no = md.match_no
  WHERE md.decided_by = 'P'
  GROUP BY mm.venue_id
  ORDER BY penalty_match_count DESC;

Question: Venue mana yang paling sering jadi tempat pertandingan yang berakhir dengan adu penalti? Saya butuh venue_id dan jumlah pertandingannya.
Generated SQL Query:
SELECT venue_id, COUNT(*) AS match_count
FROM match_mast
WHERE decided_by = 'P'
GROUP BY venue_id
ORDER BY match_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
Expected SQL Query:
SELECT mm.venue_id, COUNT(DISTINCT mm.match_no) AS penalty_match_count
  FROM match_mast mm
  JOIN match_details md ON mm.match_no = md.match_no
  WHERE md.decided_by = 'P'
  GROUP BY mm.venue_id
  ORDER BY penalty_match_count DESC;
